lender.occupational_info:
I am currently disabled. Previously, I was a manager for a very large retail corporation. I now stay home and take care of my husband. He has Stage IV Multiple Sclerosis.
I have a small backyard farm where I am currently raising 36 chickens, 3 goats, 3 ducks and 3 dogs. I sell the organic chicken eggs to pay for the feed costs for our animals. I also raise organic vegetables. I am planning to expand and raise more livestock for our own food. I am very passionate about healthy, organic foods.
As for hobbies, I also enjoy paper crafting, card making, scrapbooking, and sewing. I love to bake and cook in general.
